page.title: 11LIFE STYLES 1
page.content: We visited a Public House called The Black Boy. The Landlord was very generous and gave us all a glass of Coke. We talked to him about his general day. For breakfast he would have tea, toast, bacon, egg, sausages and fried bread. He even showed it to us! His favourite meal was seafood and fish. In The Black Boy more people drank red wine. Prices were about average. A glass of wine cost 75p; a pint of lager 88p; a glass of Coke 35p and a glass of gin was 60p. He woke up at 8.45am and finished serving in the evening at 11pm, and went to bed at midnight. His day off was Thursday. The improvements that he would like to see are having a General Store and a good, clean family Grocer.
